properties.definition: Pronouns that point to specific things.
properties.example_sentence: This is the correct model, while that one is outdated.
solution_rules: this: used to identify a specific person or thing close at hand
that: used to identify a specific person or thing farther away
these: the plural form of 'this', used for multiple items close at hand
those: the plural form of 'that', used for multiple items farther away
